personalizedmagazineservice

Class Magazine

  • java.lang.Object
    • personalizedmagazineservice.Magazine

  • public class Magazine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents Magazine which stores the information of a weekly magazine.

    Title : ICT373 Assignment 1, Question 2 - Personalised Magazine Service Author : Madyarini Grace Ariel Date : 12/6/2019 Filename : Magazine.java Purpose : Contains the Magazine class implementation as well as setter and getter methods.
